roleset.name: scoring 3 goals in one game

example.name: both args
example.text: I would like to see if Kljestan has regained some form on the international level, which has been missing for almost a year since his hattrick against Sweden in January.

roleset.note: HATTRICK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from hattrick.01-n)
